mn134:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn134:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
mn134:3.4: Atha kho candano devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ nigrodhārāmaṃ obhāsetvā yenāyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo tenupasaṅkami;
mn134:3.6: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho candano devaputto āyasmantaṃ lomasakaṅgiyaṃ etadavoca:
mn134:3.8: “Na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:3.9: Tvaṃ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā”ti?
mn134:3.10: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:3.11: Dhāresi pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti?
mn134:3.12: “Na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:3.15: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, āvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti?
mn134:3.16: “Ekamidaṃ, bhikkhu, samayaṃ bhagavā devesu tāvatiṃsesu viharati pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ.
mn134:3.17: Tatra bhagavā devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca abhāsi:
mn134:8.1: Evaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhu, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:8.2: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:8.3: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:8.4: dhārehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:8.5: Atthasaṃhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako”ti.
mn134:9.1: Atha kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo tassā rattiyā accayena senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
mn134:9.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena sāvatthi jetavanaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn134:9.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn134:10.1: “Ekamidāhaṃ, bhante, samayaṃ sakkesu viharāmi kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
mn134:10.2: Atha kho, bhante, aññataro devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ nigrodhārāmaṃ obhāsetvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
mn134:10.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho, bhante, so devaputto maṃ etadavoca:
mn134:10.6: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, bhante, taṃ devaputtaṃ etadavocaṃ:
mn134:10.7: ‘na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:10.8: Tvaṃ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā’ti?
mn134:10.9: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:10.10: Dhāresi pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā’ti?
mn134:10.11: ‘Na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:10.14: ‘Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, āvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā’ti?
mn134:10.15: ‘Ekamidaṃ, bhikkhu, samayaṃ bhagavā devesu tāvatiṃsesu viharati pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ.
mn134:10.16: Tatra kho bhagavā devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca abhāsi:
mn134:12.1: Evaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhu, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:12.2: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:12.3: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:12.4: dhārehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:12.5: Atthasaṃhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako’ti.
mn134:12.8: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca desetū”ti.
mn134:13.2: “Na kho ahaṃ, bhante, jānāmi taṃ devaputtan”ti.
mn134:13.4: Candano, bhikkhu, devaputto aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasikatvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti.
mn134:13.5: Tena hi, bhikkhu, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi;
mn134:13.7: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavato paccassosi.
mn134:18.15: evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīrati.
mn134:18.16: Kathañca, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṃhīrati …
mn134:18.18: evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṃhīrati.
mn134:23.2: Attamano āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
